attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: As O.A.P,s seem to be falling well behind on Pensions in relation to average earnings, this increase would help to redress the balance.

rejection.details: There is a similar petition at http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/honourpensions/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
